item.title: Tire swing has broken, 18th July
item.description:
One chain of the tire swing has broken and disconnected from the tire. This is very dangerous for kids who might try to ride on it. Since it's the summer holiday and a busy time for using the swing, it needs to be fixed as soon as possible.

I live t 181 and it is there. . Didn't see anyone put it there appeared overnight as wasn't there yesterday and I out rubbish out late last night and it wasn't there

item.title: Veolia. lie about cleaning the street., 18th July
item.description:
Today's date is Friday the 18th of July 2025. No cleaning was done down my Rd today.The pictures show this. Copy Dear Mr. Webster, I am writing in response to your recent email regarding street sweeping on your road. Veolia attended your location on 7th July 2025, and the street was swept in accordance with the contractual standard. If you believe this has not been done correctly, you are entitled to raise a formal complaint via the Haringey Council website, where it will be properly logged and investigated. However, I must make it absolutely clear that the language and tone used in your messages are unacceptable. Our frontline crews and customer service staff are working hard to deliver essential services and support to all residents, and they do not deserve to be subjected to abuse, personal insults, or hostile remarks. We are here to help, but we will not tolerate repeated rudeness or disrespect. Should this behaviour continue, we will be left with no choice but to cease direct communication. We expect all correspondence to be respectful and constructive and we are committed to responding in kind. Yours sincerely, Roz Belghrous Contact Centre Manager Tel.: +44 (0)208 885 7700 Watermead Way Depot | Watermead Way, London, N17 0FJ | United Kingdom www.veolia.co.uk

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dorset Road, West Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet
